name: AE1
description:
This is a work from my series Accelerated Entropy. In these works, I use 3D models of cultural heritage which has been destroyed and change them by interacting with the code. This process allows me to create a non-existing artwork from an object which does not exist anymore. The stone has been stripped of its’ meaning. These works are the result of a search for meaning in the ghost of an object which used to exist.

This used to be a funerary statue at the tower of Elahbel, Palmyra.
